OUS: It is morally wrong to keep money that one doesn’t really need if one can donate it to causes that provide effective help to those who will benefit a great deal.

OUS: It is morally right to harm an innocent person if harming them is a necessary means to helping several other innocent people.

Some may argue that the greater good justifies harming one innocent person while others may believe that intentionally causing harm is never morally right regardless of the potential benefits.
